channel.title: Downloading and Playing Silabs
channel.description:
Can someone please post me a tutorial on downloading the Silab Client and being able to play it? I can get to the login screen at the website, but everytime I try to log into someone's server it says "Error connecting to server". I'm not a pro with clients, but I am with java... so don't make fun of me, this is not a flaming thread. I'm looking for posters who like to help, and want rep++ :)
Edit: Still Don't Know what to do

item.title: Downloading and Playing Silabs

item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

so don't make fun of me, this is not a flaming thread.

Didn’t I put that in the first post?

Read full topic

just try using the web client at http://client.silabsoft.org/ and if that has the same erroe, retsrt computar and try it again, thats all i did,

I tried

item.title: Downloading and Playing Silabs
item.dc:creator: @driger driger
item.description:
@driger wrote:

If it’s still not working, and you really need to play soon play this one: http://client.silabsoft.org/ Never need to download, and has the same actions as downloadable one.

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading and Playing Silabs
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

[quote=“karuto, post:2, topic:158325”]ok heres what you do:

go to silabsoft.no-ip.org/version4.rar
^
|
DOWNLOAD it and then click run.bat. then your server will run. If you get a error saying An error occured whilst loading RuneScape. THen you open a internet type in: client.silabsoft.org then re-run it it should work then… if not i dont no what you should do.[/quote]

I dont have silabs v4 anymore and it runs for me.

Also, use the search feature or www.google.com

Please stop posting questions or request like these. ( goes to the entire community. )

Read full topic

item.title: Downloading and Playing Silabs
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

ok heres what you do:

go to silabsoft.no-ip.org/version4.rar
^
|
DOWNLOAD it and then click run.bat. then your server will run. If you get a error saying An error occured whilst loading RuneScape. THen you open a internet type in: client.silabsoft.org then re-run it it should work then… if not i dont no what you should do.

Read full topic
